title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 53 of the Air Pollution Act 1987
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Air Pollution Act 1987 (Solid
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Air Pollution Act 1987 (Solid 

Fuels, Moisture Content) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1st August 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited air pollution act 1987 (solid fuel moisture content) (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation come operation 1st august 2025

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 53 of the Air Pollution Act 1987
heading: 2. The Air Pollution Act 1987 (Solid Fuels) Regulations 2022, Regulation
text_raw:
2. The Air Pollution Act 1987 (Solid Fuels) Regulations 2022, Regulation 

5(5)(b) is amended - 

(1) By substituting for Regulation 5(5)(b) the following: 

(b) with effect from 1 September 2026, less than 20%. 

(2) By Substituting in Schedule 1 the words ‘Form of words in respect of 
wood sold in volumes of more than two cubic metres from 1 September 2025.’ 
with ‘Form of words in respect of wood sold in volumes of more than two cubic 
metres from 1 September 2026’ 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 August, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th August, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [389] 3

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 53 of the Air Pollution Act 1987
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Air Pollution Act 1987 (Solid Fuels) Regulations 
2022 to provide that the moisture content of 100% biomass fuels, including wood 
products and wood logs will be reduced from 25% to 20% from the 1st of 
September 2026. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [389]
